anya-e1212n:587_0: Vibhattiyā tato bhedo saliṅgānaṁ bhave tathā tumhādinaṁ tvaliṅgesu nevatthi pādivādinaṁ.
anya-e1212n:589_4: upa kuma asa iti ṭhite “aviggabho niccasamāso padantaraviggaho ve”ti samīpaṁ kumbhasseti padantaraciggahe-
anya-e1212n:590_0: Asaṅkhyaṁ vibhatti sampatti samipa sākalyāhāva yathāpacchā yugapadatthe.
anya-e1212n:595_0: Amādekatthā pubbaṁ yadekatthamakārantaṁ tato parāsaṁ sabbāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ lopo na hoti aṁtu bhavatyapañcamiyā-
anya-e1212n:597_0: Amādekatthā pubbaṁ yadekatthamakārantaṁ tato parāsaṁ tatiyā sattamīnaṁ aṁ hoti vā-
anya-e1212n:599_0: Amādi syādyantaṁ syādyantena saha bahulamekatthaṁ hoti-
anya-e1212n:599_15: iha pana vutti padenevopasittādi kriyāyākhyāpanato na tatthāyuttatthatā-
anya-e1212n:599_26: bahulādhikārā ntamānaniddhāriyapuraṇa bhāvati bhāvati ttatthehi nahoti-
anya-e1212n:599_36: brāhmaṇassa kaṇhā dantā iccatra dantāpekkhā chaṭṭhiti kaṇhenasambandhābhāvā na samāso-
anya-e1212n:599_37: aññamaññasambandhānaṁhi samāsoyadā tu kaṇhā ca te dantā ceti visesanasmāso tadā chaṭṭhi kaṇhadantāpekkāti brāhmaṇakaṇhadantāti hoteva-
anya-e1212n:599_38: rañño māgadhassa dhanamiccatra raññoti chaṭṭhi dhanamapekkhate na māgadhaṁ rājā eva māgadhasadadena vuccateti
anya-e1212n:599_39: bhedābhāvā sambandhābhāvoti tulyādhikaraṇena māgadhena saha rājā na samasyate-
anya-e1212n:599_40: rañño asso ca puriso cāti ettha rañño asso purisoti ca paccekaṁ sambandhato sāpekkatāya na samāso-
anya-e1212n:599_41: asso ca puriso cāti catthasamāse kate tu rājassapurisāti hotevaññānapekkhattā-
anya-e1212n:599_42: rañño garuputtoti ettha pana rājāpekkhinopi garuno puttena saha samāso gamakattā-
anya-e1212n:601_0: Visesanaṁ syādyantaṁ vasessena syādyantena samānādhikāraṇena sahekatthaṁ hoti-
anya-e1212n:601_7: muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho-
anya-e1212n:601_9: sīhoti vutte upacaritānupacaritasīhānaṁ sāmaññappatītiyaṁ munisaddo viseseti-
anya-e1212n:601_12: mahanti ca sā saddhā cāti samāse kate-
anya-e1212n:605_4: brāhmaṇa añño brāhmaṇantānajjhāsino khattiyādi brāhmaṇa sadisoyeva abrāhmaṇeti vutte patiyate-
anya-e1212n:605_5: itarasmiṁ pana pakkhe kenaci saṁsayanimittena khattiyādo brāhmaṇeti pavantassa micchāñāṇanivutti karīyati-
anya-e1212n:605_6: brāhmaṇe yaṁ’na bhavati brāhmaṇeti brāhmaṇantajjhāsito na bhavatīti attho-
anya-e1212n:605_7: tattha vinā sadisattaṁ micchāñāṇasambhavā payogasāmatthiyā ca sadisapaṭippatti taggatāca liṅgasaṅkhyā bhavanti-
anya-e1212n:605_8: atoyevoccate nañivayutta maññasadisādhikaraṇe tathā hi atthasampaccayoti-
anya-e1212n:607_0: Sarādo uttarapade nañsaddassa ana hotīti nassa ana.
anya-e1212n:609_0: Kusaddo pādayo ca syādyantena sahekatthā honti niccaṁ syādividhivisayato’ññattha-
anya-e1212n:611_0: Pagato ācariyo pācariyo-evaṁ pantevāsī-suṭṭhukataṁ sukataṁ-kicchena kataṁ dukkataṁ.
anya-e1212n:615_0: Antabhutassāppadhānassa ghapassa syādisu rasso hotīti rasso.
anya-e1212n:623_0: Anekaṁ syādyanta maññassa padassatthe ekatthaṁ vā hoti-o tiṇṇo haṁso yaṁ so otiṇṇahaṁso-(jalāsayo).
anya-e1212n:624_2: jinnotaru yena so chinnataru(pharasu)dinno suṅko yassaso dinnasuṅko(rājā)-
anya-e1212n:624_3: apagataṁ kālakaṁ yasmā so apagatakālako (paṭo)pahutaṁ dhanaṁ yassa so pahutadhano- (puriso)-
anya-e1212n:626_0: Antabhutassāppadhānassa gossa syādīsu u hoti- cittagu- (gomā)-
anya-e1212n:626_2: (vanaṁ) saha puttena vattamāno saputto saha putto vā-
anya-e1212n:626_4: dhavā ca badirā ca palāsā ceti viggahe.
anya-e1212n:628_0: Anekaṁ syādyantaṁ catthe ekatthaṁ vā bhavati-
anya-e1212n:628_1: samuccayo’nvāvayo itarītarayogo samāhāro ceti catatāro catthā-
anya-e1212n:628_2: tattha itarītarayoge samāhāre ca ekatthībhāvo sambhavati padānaṁ aññamaññasambandhato-
anya-e1212n:630_0: Catthe samāhāre yadekatthaṁ taṁ napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ bhavati-
anya-e1212n:630_7: samāse yaṁ pubbaṁ vūttaṁ tadeva pubbaṁ nipatati-
anya-e1212n:630_11: pāpā bhumi yasmiṁ pāpā ca sābhumi ceti vā viggayha samāse samāsantveccādhikāro.
anya-e1212n:632_0: Pāpādīhi parā yā bhumi tassā samāsanto a hoti-
anya-e1212n:634_0: Saṅkhyāhi parā yā bhumi tassā samāsanto ahoti-
anya-e1212n:636_0: Dīghādīhi asaṅkhyehi saṅkhyāhi ca parasmā rattisaddā anaññāsaṅkhyatthesu samasitā samāsanto a hoti-
anya-e1212n:636_1: dīghā ca sā ratti cāti dīgharattaṁ-
anya-e1212n:636_5: pubbā ca sā ratti cātī pubbarattaṁ-
anya-e1212n:638_0: Gosaddā alopacisayā samāsanto a hoti na ce catthe
anya-e1212n:639_8: “tena kataṁ kīta”miccādinā ṇike “lopo”ti tassa lope ca kane “gossuti ukāro-
anya-e1212n:640_0: Pubbuttarobhayaññatthamiccekatthaṁ catubbidhaṁ visessaññobhayatthatā tidhā vakkhanti taṁ pare.
anya-e1212n:644_0: Itthiyaṁ vattamānato akārantato nāmasmā āppaccayo hoti-devadattā, ajā, kokilā, iccādi.
anya-e1212n:646_2: ṅakāro “ntantunaṁ ṅimhi to ve”ti saṅketattho- nadī, mahī, kumārī, taruṇi, vāruṇi, gotamī,
anya-e1212n:646_4: “ntantunaṁ ṅimhi to ve”ti vā takāre- gacchatī- gacchatī-
anya-e1212n:646_6: “gotovā“ti nadādisu pāṭhā vā ṅīmhi “gossāvaṅa”ti gosaddassa āvaṅa- gāvī, go.
anya-e1212n:650_0: Itthiyamivaṇṇuvaṇṇantehi nī hoti bahulaṁ-payatapāṇinī, daṇḍinī, bhikkhunī, paracittavidunī.
anya-e1212n:658_0: Sarānamādibhuta ye akārivaṇṇavaṇṇā tesaṁ ā e o honti yathākkamaṁ ṇanubandheti akārassa akāro.
anya-e1212n:668_0: Vacchādito gottādibhutā gaṇato ca ṇana ṇayanappaccayā honti paputtādo’pacce-
anya-e1212n:671_0: Kattikādīhi vidhavādīhi ca ṇeyyaṇerā vā yathākkamaṁ,
anya-e1212n:675_0: Sarānamādibhutā ye ayuvaṇṇā tesaṁ ā e o honti kvaci deva saṁyogavisaye ṇanubandheti visayasattamiyā niddiṭṭhattā saṁyogato pubbeva ekāro.
anya-e1212n:679_0: Yakārādo paccaye gossuvaṇṇassa ca avaṅa hotīti ukārassa avaṅa.
anya-e1212n:681_4: te neva vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṁ vāsiṭṭho tveva hoti.
anya-e1212n:683_0: Rājasaddato ñño vā hotapacce jātiyaṁ gammamānāyaṁ-rañño apaccaṁ rājañño-jātiyanti kiṁ?-Rājāpaccaṁ.
anya-e1212n:685_0: Khattasaddā yeyā hontapacce jātiyaṁ-khattassāpaccaṁ khattyo, khattiyo-jātiyantveva-khatti.
anya-e1212n:687_0: Manusaddato jātiyaṁ ssa saṇa hotapacce-makanuno apaccaṁ manusso, mānuso-jātiyantveva-mānavo.
anya-e1212n:689_1: tannāmasmā khattiyāpacce raññe ca ṇe hoti-
anya-e1212n:689_2: pañcālānaṁ apaccaṁ rājā vā pañcālo, māgadho-
anya-e1212n:691_0: Kurusivīhapacce raññe ca ṇyo hoti-kurunaṁ apaccaṁ rājāvā korabbo, sebbo.
anya-e1212n:693_3: idha kasmā na hoti’ nīlaṁ pītanti?
anya-e1212n:695_0: Tatiyattato nakkhattā tena lakkhite kāle ṇe hoti tañce nakkhattaminduyuttaṁ hoti-
anya-e1212n:697_0: Seti paṭhamantā asseti chaṭṭhatthe ṇe hoti yaṁ paṭhamantaṁ sā dve devatā puṇṇamāsī vā-
anya-e1212n:697_1: sugato devatā asseti sogato- māhindo, yāmo, cāruṇo-
anya-e1212n:700_0: Dutiyantato tamadhīte tañjānātīti etesvattesu ṇehoti koṇiko ca-
anya-e1212n:700_2: katayādesassikārassa“tadā desā tadiva bhavanti“ti ñāyā sarānamaccādinā ekāre yāgamadvittāni- ke- kamako, padako- ṇike-
anya-e1212n:704_0: Purā iccetasmā bhavatthe ṇe hoti tano va-purā bhavo purāṇe, purātano.
anya-e1212n:706_0: Amā saddato acco hoti bhavatthe-amā bhavo amacco.
anya-e1212n:710_0: Sattamyantā ete paccayā honti bahulaṁ bhavatthe- kaṇa-
anya-e1212n:710_5: “ṇiko”ti sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇiko hoti sarade bhāvo sāradiko,
anya-e1212n:712_0: Paṭhamantā sippādivācakā asseti chaṭṭhatthe ṇiko hoti-
anya-e1212n:712_5: sataṁ payojanamassa sātikaṁ“taṁhantārahati gacchatuñchaticarati”ti dutiyantā bhanticcevamādisavatthesu ṇiko hoti-
anya-e1212n:712_12: “tena kataṁ kītaṁ baddhamabhiyaṅkhataṁ kasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ hataṁ hanti jitaṁ jayati dibbati khanati tarati carati
anya-e1212n:712_13: vahati jīvati”ti tatiyantā katādisvatthesu ṇiko hoti-
anya-e1212n:712_24: iha nabhavati “aṅguliyā khantī”ti anabhidhānā abhidhānalakkhaṇa hi tabbādi ṇadisamāsā-
anya-e1212n:714_0: Pañcamyantā sambhu tamāgatanti etesvatthesuṇiko hoti-mātito sambhutamāgataṁ vā mattikaṁ, pettikaṁ.
anya-e1212n:723_0: Anto saro ādi yassāvayavassa tassa lopo hoti rānubandheti ulopo-pitu bhātā petteyyo.
anya-e1212n:725_0: Mātuto ce pituto ca tesaṁ bhaginiyaṁ cho hoti-mātubhagini mātucchā-“itthiyamatvā”ti ā-evampitucchā.
anya-e1212n:729_0: Mātāpitūhi hite reyyaṇa hoti-mātu hito matteyyo, pitu hito petteyyo.
anya-e1212n:731_0: Paṭhamantā asseti asmiṁ atthe ṇiko hoti kova tañce paṭhamantaṁ parimāṇambhavati.
anya-e1212n:732_0: Doṇe parimāṇamassa doṇiko, (vīhi)-ekamparimāṇamassa ekakaṁ-dvikaṁ, tikaṁ, catukkaṁ, pañcakamiccādi.
anya-e1212n:734_0: Tārakādihi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhatthe ito hoti te
anya-e1212n:735_0: Ce sañjātā honti-tārakā sañjātā assa tārakitaṁ-(gaganaṁ)-pupchito-(rukkho).
anya-e1212n:737_0: Paṭhamantā mānavuttito asseti asmiṁ atthe matto hoti-
anya-e1212n:739_0: Purisā paṭhamantā uddhamānavuttito asseti asmiṁ atthe ṇe hoti matta tagghā ca-
anya-e1212n:740_0: Tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttanaṇyaṇeyya ṇigha ṇiyā.
anya-e1212n:741_0: Bhavanti etasmā saddabuddhīti bhāvo saddappavatti nimittaṁ-
anya-e1212n:741_2: chaṭāṭhiyantā bhāve kamme ca tta tādayo honti bahulaṁ-
anya-e1212n:741_3: sāmaññavidhayo payogamanusārayantiti kuto ci dvīsukuto ci bhāve yeva-
anya-e1212n:741_4: na ca sabbe sabbato honti aññatra ttatāhi-
anya-e1212n:741_5: nīlassa paṭāssa bhāvo nīlattaṁ nīlatāti guṇe bhāvo-
anya-e1212n:741_6: iha guṇavasā nilasaddonīlaguṇayutte dabbe vattate nimittassarupānugatāñcabuddhi-
anya-e1212n:741_7: evamaññatrāpi yathānurūpaṁñātabbaṁ nīlassaguṇassa bhāvo nīlattaṁnīlatāti nīlaguṇajāti-
anya-e1212n:741_13: alasassa bhāvo kammaṁ vā alasattaṁ alasatā- ttana,
anya-e1212n:741_16: akiñcanameva ākiñcaññaṁ- ṇeyya, soceyyaṁ- ṇa, pāṭavaṁ- avaṅa- iya, naggiyaṁ- ṇi ya,
anya-e1212n:744_0: Tassa vikārāvayavesu ṇa ṇika ṇeyya mayā.
anya-e1212n:745_1: chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vikāre’vayave ca ṇadayo honti bahulaṁ- ṇa,
anya-e1212n:750_0: Ekasmā asahāyatthe ka ākī honti-eko’va ekako, ekākī.
anya-e1212n:752_0: Upadvitīhi avayavavuttīhi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhatthe ayo hoti-
anya-e1212n:752_1: ubho aṁsā assa ubhayaṁ. Dvayaṁ. Tayaṁ-
anya-e1212n:752_3: “catutthadutiyesvesaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti nipātanā pūraṇatthe dvito tiyo dvissa du ca ticatuhi atiyattāca- dutiyo. Tatiyo. Catuttho.
anya-e1212n:754_0: Chaṭṭhiyantāya pañcādikāya saṅkhyāya katismā ca mo hoti pūraṇatthe-
anya-e1212n:756_0: Chasaddā ṭṭha ṭṭhamā honti puraṇatthe-channaṁ pūraṇe chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhamo vā.
anya-e1212n:758_0: Chaṭṭhiyantāyekādasādikāya saṅkhyāya ḍo hoti pūraṇatthe vibhāsā-
anya-e1212n:760_0: Se pare satyantassa tikārassa lopo hotīti tilopo. Ekunavīso.
anya-e1212n:762_0: Satādikāya saṅkhyāya chaṭṭhiyantāya puranatthe mo hoti satā dinami cāntādeso-
anya-e1212n:762_3: Vīsati adhikā asmiṁ sate sahasse vāti evamādiviggahe.
anya-e1212n:764_0: Satyantāya mutyantāya īsantāya āsantāya dasantāya ca saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asminti sattamyatthe ḍo hoti
anya-e1212n:764_1: sā ce saṅkhyā adhikā hoti yadasminti tañce sataṁ sahassaṁ satasahassaṁ vā hoti- tilope- vīsaṁ- sataṁ, sahassaṁ,
anya-e1212n:764_6: satasahassaṁ vā- āsantāya- paññāsaṁ- sataṁ, sahassaṁ.
anya-e1212n:766_0: Paṭhamantā ettha assa atthīti etesvatthesu mantu hoti-
anya-e1212n:766_1: itisaddassa vivakkhāniyamanatthattā pahutādiyutteyeva atthyatthe hoti- vuttaṁhi.
anya-e1212n:769_0: Pahutā gāvo ettha dese assa vā purisassa santīti sagomāpasaṁsāyaṁ.
anya-e1212n:769_1: Pasatthā jāti assa atthīti jātimā- nindāyaṁ,
anya-e1212n:771_0: Paṭhamantato avaṇṇantā mantvatthe vantu hoti-sīlavā, dayāvā-avaṇṇāti kiṁ? Buddhimā.
anya-e1212n:773_0: Daṇḍādīhi ika ī honti vā mantvatthe- daṇḍiko, daṇḍī-
anya-e1212n:773_2: itisaddassa visasaniyamantthattā kuto ci dve kutoce kamekaṁva- nāviko, sukhī.
anya-e1212n:775_0: Tapādito vā ssī hoti mantvatthe-tapassī, yasassī-vātveca-yasavā.
anya-e1212n:781_3: “ito tetto kuto”ti imassa ṭi nipaccate etassa ṭaeta kassa kuttañca-
anya-e1212n:783_0: Abhiādīhi to hoti-apañcamyantehipi vidhānatto’yaṁ-abhito, parito, pacchato, heṭṭhato.
anya-e1212n:785_0: Ādippabhutīhi to hoti-ādo ādito, majjhe majjhato, yaṁ yato.
anya-e1212n:789_0: Ete saddā nipaccante-kasmiṁ kattha, kutra, kva-etasmiṁ ettha, atra-asmiṁ iha, idha.
anya-e1212n:795_0: Sattamyantā tato vāhaṁ hoti hiñca-tahaṁ, tahiṁ-vātveva-tatra.
anya-e1212n:797_0: Kiṁsaddā sattamyantā hiṁ haṁ nipaccante kissa kukā ca-kuhiṁ kahaṁ-sabbasmiṁ kāleccevamādi viggahe.
anya-e1212n:799_0: Etehi sattamyantehi kāle dā hoti-sabbadā ekadā, aññadā, yadā, tadā.
anya-e1212n:801_0: Ete saddā nipaccante-kasmiṁ kāle kadā, kudā-sabbasmiṁ kāle sadā-imasmiṁ kāle adhunā, idāni.
anya-e1212n:804_0: Pakati paccayo ādeso kālavisesoti sabbametaṁ nipātanā labbhati-
anya-e1212n:808_0: Ete saddā nipaccante pakāreti kimimehi thaṁpaccayoketa tesaṁ yathākkamaṁ-
anya-e1212n:809_0: Ekena pakārena ekaṁ vā pakāraṁ karoticcevamādiviggahe.
anya-e1212n:813_0: Ekasmā pakāre jjhaṁ vā hoti-ekajjhaṁ-vāti kiṁ, ekadhā.
anya-e1212n:815_0: Dvitīhi pakāre edhā vā hoti-medhā, tedhā-vātveva-dvidhā, tidhā-ekaṁ vāraṁ bhuñjaticcevamādiviggahe.
anya-e1212n:817_0: Vārasambandhitiyā katisaṅkhyāya kkhattuṁ hoti-kativāre bhujati katikkhattuṁ bhuñjati.
anya-e1212n:819_0: Vārasambandhiniyā bahusaṅkhyāya dhā hoti kkhattuñca vārānañce paccāsatti hoti-
anya-e1212n:819_1: bahuvāre buñjati bahudhā vā divasassa buñjati,
anya-e1212n:821_0: Ekaṁ vāramiccasmiṁ atthe sakinti vā nipaccate ekasmā kiṁ ekassa ca sādeso-
anya-e1212n:821_1: ekaṁ vāraṁ bhuñjati sakiṁ bhuñjati- vāti kiṁ,
anya-e1212n:823_0: Kriyāya guṇena dabbena vā bhinne atthe vyāpitumicchā vīcchāvīcchāyampakāre ca so hoti bahulaṁ-
anya-e1212n:823_1: sāmaññaniddesā yathāsambhavaṁ vibhattyantā yato kuto visaddā hoti-
anya-e1212n:825_0: Avatthāvato’vatthantarenābhutassa tāyāvatthāya bhāve karāsabhūhi sambandhe sati vakāravācakācī hoti-
anya-e1212n:825_3: adhavalo dhavalo siyā bhavati vā dhavalīsiyā.
anya-e1212n:827_3: tatta yasmiṁ kriyatthe kattuvācini kammaṁ gavesīyate,
anya-e1212n:827_5: tesu yathārahaṁ sakamma kato kammādo kārake kammāvacanicchāyambhāve ca tabbādayo veditabbā-
anya-e1212n:827_6: akammakato pana bhāvo kammavajjite ca kārake-
anya-e1212n:827_7: kriyāti ca gamanapacanādiko asattasammato kattarī kammevā patiṭṭhito kārakasamūhasādhiyo padattho vuccati, vuttaṁhi.
anya-e1212n:830_0: Kara karaṇe-akāro uccāraṇattho-evamuttaratrāpi-kariti ṭhite-bahulamiti sabbattha vattate.
anya-e1212n:832_0: Tabbaaniyā kriyatthā pare bhāvakammesu bahulaṁ bhavanti-
anya-e1212n:834_0: Tumādisu paccayesu vā karassa ā hoti-aññatra.
anya-e1212n:836_0: Kriyatthānamantabyañjanassa pararūpaṁ hoti yakārato’ññasmiṁ byañjanādo paccayeti pararūpaṁ-
